Momocs

Converts Momocs objects to data.frames

Used in particular for compatibility with the tidyverse

as_df(x)

# S3 method for Coo
as_df(x)

# S3 method for Coe
as_df(x)

# S3 method for TraCoe
as_df(x)

# S3 method for PCA
as_df(x)

# S3 method for LDA
as_df(x)

Arguments

x

an object, typically a Momocs object

Value

a data.frame

See also

Other bridges functions: bridges, complex, export

Examples

# smaller Out
lite_bot <- bot %>% slice(c(1, 2, 21, 22)) %>% coo_sample(12)
# Coo object
lite_bot %>% as_df %>% head
#>       id   x   y   type fake
#> 1 brahma  37 561 whisky    a
#> 2 brahma  63 361 whisky    a
#> 3 brahma  42 150 whisky    a
#> 4 brahma 143  15 whisky    a
#> 5 brahma 316 113 whisky    a
#> 6 brahma 305 302 whisky    a
# Coe object
lite_bot %>% efourier(2) %>% as_df %>% head
#> you selected `norm=TRUE`, which is not recommended. See ?efourier
#>       id coefficient        value   type fake
#> 1 brahma          A1  1.000000000 whisky    a
#> 2 brahma          A2  0.011981787 whisky    a
#> 3 brahma          B1  0.000000000 whisky    a
#> 4 brahma          B2 -0.001124918 whisky    a
#> 5 brahma          C1  0.000000000 whisky    a
#> 6 brahma          C2 -0.004341232 whisky    a
# PCA object
lite_bot %>% efourier(2) %>% PCA %>% as_df %>% head
#> you selected `norm=TRUE`, which is not recommended. See ?efourier
#>           .id   type fake         PC1           PC2           PC3          PC4
#> 1      brahma whisky    a -0.04488046  0.0168529232  4.544783e-05 5.614897e-17
#> 2       caney whisky    a -0.03300353 -0.0081976554  4.283401e-03 5.093717e-17
#> 3       amrut   beer    c -0.05172598 -0.0088654471 -3.884884e-03 4.245244e-17
#> 4 ballantines   beer    c  0.12960997  0.0002101794 -4.439654e-04 7.247341e-17
# LDA object
lite_bot %>% efourier(2) %>% PCA %>% LDA(~type) %>% as_df %>% head
#> you selected `norm=TRUE`, which is not recommended. See ?efourier
#> 2 PC retained
#>           PC1           PC2      f
#> 1 -0.04488046  0.0168529232 whisky
#> 2 -0.03300353 -0.0081976554 whisky
#> 3 -0.05172598 -0.0088654471   beer
#> 4  0.12960997  0.0002101794   beer
